name: Fred!
description:
Fred! for the Global Game Jam (MalagaJamWeekend 12)

We recommend to play it on Full Screen

Fred is a game where you help people find their lost stuff! During the early morning you'll have to pick up the forgetten items on the museum, to later on giving it back to its owner. Yet! customers may not be as helpful as you might think, but remember to always be nice to customers ;)

Game Design: Lindryn

Programming: Josioque, Jaime , Goonie

Art:  Pirty , Nestiboy99 , Christian

Sounds & music: Pirty, Drakairo, Juan Pablo De Amo
